data.lyric:
[ti:Drinking Alone]
[ar:Carrie Underwood]
[al:Cry Pretty]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Drinking Alone - Carrie Underwood (凯莉·安德伍德)
[00:02.42]Producer：David Garcia/Carrie Underwood
[00:04.85]Ooh ooh ooh ooh ooh ooh
[00:12.24]Ooh ooh ooh ooh ooh ooh
[00:17.36]Let me make one thing clear
[00:19.13]You can buy me a beer
[00:20.92]But you ain't taking me home
[00:24.58]No pick up lines
[00:26.16]I came here tonight
[00:28.04]To shed a few tears on my own
[00:31.88]But sitting there across the room
[00:33.69]I couldn't help
[00:34.52]But notice you seem a little down on your love too
[00:38.79]Yeah my heart might be breaking
[00:40.74]But this seat ain't taken
[00:42.90]And you've got me thinkin'
[00:44.88]We should be drinking alone together
[00:49.49]Drownin' the pain is better
[00:52.76]With somebody else who got problems
[00:55.50]We ain't gonna solve 'em
[00:57.29]But misery loves company
[01:00.20]Tonight all I need is a stranger
[01:04.34]Lips with a whiskey chaser
[01:08.21]And a corner booth kiss
[01:10.24]To make me forget that he's gone
[01:13.32]Oh we should be drinking alone
[01:18.25]Ooh ooh ooh ooh ooh ooh
[01:21.57]We should be drinking alone
[01:25.62]Ooh ooh ooh ooh ooh ooh
[01:27.11]Together
[01:30.39]I don't know what she did to make you hurt like this
[01:34.04]But I know just what to do
[01:37.84]It starts with a bottle of good reposado
[01:41.51]And ends with a shooter or two
[01:45.30]Tomorrow when the sun comes up
[01:47.11]Tonight's the night that never was
[01:49.09]Baby just forget my name
[01:52.29]Won't be your one and only
[01:54.33]But just 'cause we're lonely
[01:56.12]Don't mean that we should
[01:58.41]We should be drinking alone
[02:02.80]'Cause drownin' the pain is better
[02:06.26]With somebody else who got problems
[02:09.00]We ain't gonna solve 'em
[02:10.80]But misery loves company
[02:13.90]Tonight all I need is a stranger
[02:17.78]Lips with a whiskey chaser
[02:21.67]And a corner booth kiss
[02:23.58]To make me forget that he's gone
[02:26.90]Oh we should be drinking alone
[02:30.10]Drinking alone drinking alone
[02:33.01]Together
[02:33.45]Maybe we shouldn't be drinking alone
[02:35.73]We should be drinking alone
[02:37.53]Drinking alone drinking alone
[02:40.49]Baby we shouldn't be drinking alone
[02:43.50]I'll pretend that I care
[02:45.46]Baby pull up a chair
[02:47.25]We'll stay here 'til they make us go home
[02:51.87]We should be drinking alone
[02:55.63]Ooh ooh ooh ooh ooh ooh
[02:58.10]Oh we should be drinking alone together
[03:03.59]Drownin' the pain is better
[03:06.94]With somebody else who got problems
[03:09.58]We ain't gonna solve 'em
[03:11.46]But misery loves company
[03:14.32]Tonight all I need is a stranger
[03:18.27]Lips with a whiskey chaser
[03:22.32]And a corner booth kiss
[03:24.28]To make me forget that he's gone
[03:27.47]Oh we should be drinking alone
[03:30.29]Drinking alone drinking alone
[03:33.63]Together
[03:34.06]Maybe we shouldn't be drinking alone
[03:35.94]We should be drinking alone
[03:37.79]Drinking alone drinking alone
[03:41.22]Baby we shouldn't be drinking alone
[03:47.04]Ooh ooh ooh ooh ooh ooh
[03:50.24]We should be drinking alone
[03:54.38]Ooh ooh ooh ooh ooh ooh
[03:56.76]Ooh ooh ooh
data.trans:
[ti:Drinking Alone]
[ar:Carrie Underwood]
[al:Cry Pretty]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.42]//
[00:04.85]//
[00:12.24]//
[00:17.36]让我先把话说清楚
[00:19.13]你可以请我喝啤酒
[00:20.92]但你不能带我回家
[00:24.58]不准和我搭讪
[00:26.16]今晚我来这里
[00:28.04]只想一个人流眼泪
[00:31.88]但是坐在酒吧里
[00:33.69]我情不自禁
[00:34.52]发现你好像也有点为情所困
[00:38.79]我的心或许会痛
[00:40.74]但这个位置没人坐
[00:42.90]你让我忍不住想
[00:44.88]我们应该一起喝几杯孤独的酒
[00:49.49]借酒浇愁
[00:52.76]就该找个同病相怜的人一起来
[00:55.50]我们无法解决烦恼
[00:57.29]但是有人陪 就不会那么痛苦
[01:00.20]今夜我只想找个陌生人
[01:04.34]嘴唇上沾着威士忌
[01:08.21]在角落里亲吻
[01:10.24]让我忘记他已经离去的事实
[01:13.32]我们应该喝几杯孤独的酒
[01:18.25]//
[01:21.57]我们应该喝几杯孤独的酒
[01:25.62]//
[01:27.11]一起喝几杯
[01:30.39]我不知道她做了什么 让你这样难受
[01:34.04]但我知道该怎么做
[01:37.84]从一瓶美味龙舌兰酒开始
[01:41.51]最后来一两杯调味酒
[01:45.30]等到明天太阳升起
[01:47.11]今夜的事情就当做没发生过
[01:49.09]宝贝 忘记我的名字
[01:52.29]我不会做你的唯一
[01:54.33]但仅仅是因为我们寂寞
[01:56.12]并不意味着我们应该
[01:58.41]我们应该喝几杯孤独的酒
[02:02.80]因为 借酒浇愁
[02:06.26]就该找个同病相怜的人一起来
[02:09.00]我们无法解决烦恼
[02:10.80]但是有人陪 就不会那么痛苦
[02:13.90]今夜我只想找个陌生人
[02:17.78]嘴唇上沾着威士忌
[02:21.67]在角落里亲吻
[02:23.58]让我忘记他已经离去的事实
[02:26.90]我们应该喝几杯孤独的酒
[02:30.10]喝几杯孤独的酒
[02:33.01]一起喝几杯
[02:33.45]或许我们应该喝几杯孤独的酒
[02:35.73]我们应该喝几杯孤独的酒
[02:37.53]喝几杯孤独的酒
[02:40.49]宝贝 我们不该独自饮酒
[02:43.50]我会装作我在意
[02:45.46]宝贝 拉一把椅子过来
[02:47.25]我们就待在这里 直到他们赶我们回家
[02:51.87]我们应该喝几杯孤独的酒
[02:55.63]//
[02:58.10]我们应该一起喝几杯孤独的酒
[03:03.59]借酒浇愁
[03:06.94]就该找个同病相怜的人一起来
[03:09.58]我们无法解决烦恼
[03:11.46]但是有人陪 就不会那么痛苦

[03:24.28]让我忘记他已经离去的事实
[03:27.47]我们应该喝几杯孤独的酒

[03:35.94]我们应该喝几杯孤独的酒
[03:37.79]喝几杯孤独的酒
